
# 领域服务/基础领域 - 查询药品科室人员限制 - 查询药品科室人员限制 正向用例
## 请求参数：
``` json
{
  "hospCode": "NXRY",
  "pageIndex": 1,
  "orgCode": "NXRMYY",
  "pageSize": 3
}
```
## 返回参数：
``` json
{
    "exception": null,
    "apiCode": null,
    "data": {
        "list": [
            {
                "id": "264338388705497088",
                "orgCode": "NXRMYY",
                "hospCode": "NXRY",
                "createDate": "2020-07-13 18:26:23",
                "updateDate": "2020-07-13 18:26:23",
                "isDelete": "N",
                "drugId": "255570147569201153",
                "drugName": "连花清瘟胶囊",
                "deptId": "224706654205014016",
                "deptName": "监控室",
                "memberId": null,
                "memberName": null,
                "drgRoomId": null,
                "drgRoomName": null,
                "limitMode": "0",
                "limitType": "0",
                "createUserId": "20200327091617732",
                "updateUserId": "20200327091617732"
            },
            {
                "id": "264338388772605952",
                "orgCode": "NXRMYY",
                "hospCode": "NXRY",
                "createDate": "2020-07-13 18:26:23",
                "updateDate": "2020-07-13 18:26:23",
                "isDelete": "N",
                "drugId": "255570147569201153",
                "drugName": "连花清瘟胶囊",
                "deptId": "224706726032470016",
                "deptName": "医疗安全办公室",
                "memberId": null,
                "memberName": null,
                "drgRoomId": null,
                "drgRoomName": null,
                "limitMode": "0",
                "limitType": "0",
                "createUserId": "20200327091617732",
                "updateUserId": "20200327091617732"
            },
            {
                "id": "388519934169518080",
                "orgCode": "NXRMYY",
                "hospCode": "NXRY",
                "createDate": "2021-06-21 10:43:02",
                "updateDate": "2021-06-21 10:43:02",
                "isDelete": "N",
                "drugId": "20200408030348630",
                "drugName": "六味地黄丸",

                "updateUserId": "249434671812333568"

        ],

        "pageNo": 3,

}
```

# 领域服务/基础领域 - 查询药品科室人员限制 - 必填校验-[orgCode]为空
## 请求参数：
``` json
{
  "drugIds": [
    "20200408030207517",
    "20200408030224705",
    "20200408030209034",
    "20200408030204933",
    "257470598786732033",
    "245090258570579969",
    "234508262296018945",
    "234871642022510593",
    "232686314133803009",
    "235937720723079169",
    "233784716959567873",
    "234232122188648449",
    "252942592357314561",
    "234137504130420737",
    "234148998553423873",
    "234504637301678081",
    "235962445553762305",
    "233786479485800449",
    "237365887383523329",
    "234211325059420161",
    "318663279244247040",
    "20200408030220726",
    "20200408030226274",
    "20200408030216224",
    "20200408030251595",
    "20200408030224096",
    "20200408030215012",
    "20200408030216464",
    "20200408030251115",
    "20200408030248178",
    "20200408030208959",
    "20200408030225176",
    "20200408030209802",
    "20200408030236084",
    "20200408030229654",
    "20200408030220962",
    "20200408030242515",
    "20200408030228582",
    "20200408030227133",
    "20200408030213088",
    "20200408030214298",
    "20200408030215271",
    "20200408030217690",
    "20200408030218661",
    "20200408030207976",
    "20200408030243951",
    "20200408030217457",
    "20200408030252542",
    "20200408030234912",
    "20200408030250364"
  ],
  "hospCode": "NXRY",
  "pageIndex": 1,
  "orgCode": "",
  "pageSize": 3
}
```
## 返回参数：
``` json
{
  "exception": null,
  "apiCode": null,
  "data": null,
  "Code": 1,
  "Message": "医院编码不能为空"
}
```
# 领域服务/基础领域 - 查询药品科室人员限制 - 必填校验-[hospCode]为空

``` json
{
  "drugIds": [
    "20200408030207517",
    "20200408030224705",
    "20200408030209034",
    "20200408030204933",
```

# 领域服务/基础领域 - 查询药品科室人员限制 - 依赖用例-[orgCode]赋值为依赖用例测试值

``` json
{
  "drugIds": [
    "20200408030207517",
    "20200408030224705",
    "20200408030209034",
    "20200408030204933",
    "257470598786732033",
    "245090258570579969",
    "234508262296018945",
    "234871642022510593",
    "232686314133803009",
    "235937720723079169",
    "233784716959567873",
    "234232122188648449",
    "252942592357314561",
    "234137504130420737",
    "234148998553423873",
    "234504637301678081",
    "235962445553762305",
    "233786479485800449",
    "237365887383523329",
    "234211325059420161",
    "318663279244247040",
    "20200408030220726",
    "20200408030226274",
    "20200408030216224",
    "20200408030251595",
    "20200408030224096",
    "20200408030215012",
    "20200408030216464",
    "20200408030251115",
    "20200408030248178",
    "20200408030208959",
    "20200408030225176",
    "20200408030209802",
    "20200408030236084",
    "20200408030229654",
    "20200408030220962",
    "20200408030242515",
    "20200408030228582",
    "20200408030227133",
    "20200408030213088",
    "20200408030214298",
    "20200408030215271",
    "20200408030217690",
    "20200408030218661",
    "20200408030207976",
    "20200408030243951",
    "20200408030217457",
    "20200408030252542",
    "20200408030234912",
    "20200408030250364"
  ],
  "hospCode": "NXRY",
  "pageIndex": 1,
  "orgCode": "依赖用例测试值",
  "pageSize": 3
}
```

``` json
  "apiCode": null,
```

``` json
{
  "drugIds": [
    "20200408030207517",
    "20200408030224705",
    "20200408030209034",
    "20200408030204933",
    "257470598786732033",
    "245090258570579969",
    "234508262296018945",

    "232686314133803009",

    "234137504130420737",
    "234148998553423873",

    "235962445553762305",
    "233786479485800449",
    "237365887383523329",
    "234211325059420161",
    "318663279244247040",
    "20200408030220726",
    "20200408030226274",

    "20200408030251595",

    "20200408030251115",
    "20200408030248178",
    "20200408030208959",
    "20200408030225176",
    "20200408030209802",
    "20200408030236084",
    "20200408030229654",
    "20200408030220962",
    "20200408030242515",
    "20200408030228582",
    "20200408030227133",
    "20200408030213088",
    "20200408030214298",
    "20200408030215271",
    "20200408030217690",
    "20200408030218661",
    "20200408030207976",
    "20200408030243951",
    "20200408030217457",
    "20200408030252542",
    "20200408030234912",
    "20200408030250364"
  ],
  "hospCode": "依赖用例测试值",
  "pageIndex": 1,
  "orgCode": "NXRMYY",
  "pageSize": 3
```
